name: Escape The Village On May 2nd
description: You will have a whole medium level challenge wheelchair accessible A hushed whisper beckons you closer to hear their plea… “Greetings, stranger. You may notice something… odd about this place. Lately, the people of the Village at Black Creek have been possessed by something vile in nature. I fear a terrible evil has set root here. Please stranger, you are only a visitor to this place but… Will you help me unravel this dark plot?”

name: Where Dark Things Dwell
description: A very fun, creepy experience! Where Dark Things Dwell is one of the most unique escape experiences I’ve ever participated in. The puzzles are challenging but there are very helpful hints available should you need them! The whole experience leans toward creepy rather than scary but be warned, you will be expected to enter pitch black building with no idea what awaits inside... Overall, a 10/10 experience, and I would highly recommend it to anyone!

The puzzles are challenging but there are very helpful hints available should you need them! The whole experience leans toward creepy rather than scary but be warned, you will be expected to enter pitch black building with no idea what awaits inside... Overall, a 10/10 experience, and I would highly recommend it to anyone!

Let their immersive performances pull you into the story at the heart of the village. A real historical village Built within the historical Village at Black Creek, the sets and costumes will whisk you away to a bygone era. Wander the old village after dark and after hours. Your ticket is your key to be whisked away to a time long lost.

name: Casa Loma's Dragon Egg Adventure
description: You have been asked to embark upon a dangerous quest: to save dragons from extinction. Casa Loma’s tower becomes a portal to another world of wizards and magic, where the last dragon egg is rumoured to rest. Will you find the egg and learn the secret of the dragon’s song? Those who you will encounter upon this quest may be your closest confidants or may be unfamiliar faces.

location.address: 1 Austin Terrace, Toronto, M5R 1X8
location.instructions: Meet your team at 1 Austin Terrace, Toronto, M5R 1X8. Walk towards the terrace on the East side of the building (if you're facing the main doors of Casa Loma, it will be around to your left). Beware of vines and crocodile filled moats as you approach. Just past the terrace there will be a black door marked as "AUTHORIZED PERSONS ONLY". Ring the gold and black doorbell, wait a moment, then pull the handle to open the door.

name: Station M
description: This challenge includes Patriots and code crackers: an intruder has breached the tunnels... Station M was the cloak-and-dagger handle given to the covert intel hub concealed beneath the towers and ballrooms of Casa Loma. After the Big War, the facility was mothballed and left to slumber in the subterranean tunnels — until now. Against all logic, a Soviet mole posing as one of our agents has been discovered in Station M. Your mission: assist the operative in navigating the shadowy depths of Station M and find what information has been leaked.

name: Station M
description: The story was great, being in the tunnels was so cool, everything felt so real and all the props provided instant feedback if you solved something. We loved the attention to detail in every room and the enthusiasm of the staff... Definitely one of the most fun things to do in Toronto.

name: Station M
description: The war is over, the fascists in Europe have lost, and it’s time for celebration; or so it would seem. When a mysterious signal is received from the long-dormant Station M spy facility, it’s up to your team of counterspies and codebreakers to investigate the tunnels beneath the castle. Will you find the source of the signal–before it finds you, in the dark tunnels that run below Casa Loma? Can you get in and out in time?

name: Murdoch Mysteries Theatrical Escape Room
description: You may partake in this adventure for a fee of Choose your comrades wisely, we allow You must find Detective Murdoch within The experience is rated Be warned, the station house has Constables: assist us in locating Detective Murdoch! Listen up! The greatest detective in all of Canada has gone missing, and 'tis up to us to find him! As the newest constables on the force in Toronto in 1905, we must make locating William Murdoch our number one priority. We have all the resources of Station House No. 4 at our fingertips, but 'twill take more than brute strength to save Murdoch. It will take wit, intelligence, and unrelenting determination. Are ye with me? Fear not, for this experience shall not send shivers down your spine. Nor shall it, hopefully, terrify our dear Detective Murdoch wherever he may be. Live actors shall be in attendance, but they shall not lay a hand on you, and we ask the same courtesy in return. Let the sets and costumes whisk you away to Toronto in the late 1800s. Relax, and let us take you on a journey. This experience grants you exclusive access to some buildings on the Casa Loma grounds not open to the general public. Do you have the daring and courage to partake in this exclusive adventure?

name: The Wedding Party
description: The Wedding Party returns again, ready to immerse you in a thrilling experience of puzzles and espionage. Come dressed in your best, and enjoy a 3 course meal and drinks, wrapped in a theatrical and immersive mystery! There's something strange lingering in the background of The Wedding Party. Puzzles and mysterious messages are hidden throughout the venue, waiting to reveal an unexpected truth. Be a part of the story As an old friend of the bride, expect to interact and speak with the main characters of the story, as you will become a main character yourself…

name: Murder Mystery Dinner
description: In collaboration with Netflix, Secret City presents a one-of-a-kind Murder Mystery Dinner experience. Set in the captivating and thrilling universe of the film series, this immersive event will have you on the edge of your seats as you and your team work to uncover the truth. As a member of the culinary industry elite, you’re invited to an exclusive event hosted by acclaimed Chef Maribelle Moore. Decipher the clues hidden within Maribelle’s menu. Each course contains vital information with food-based puzzles. The menu Chef Moore created will reveal a dark secret about the Salty Six, the renowned culinary supergroup formed by herself and five other chefs back when they were students.

The mysterious one-of-a-kind dinner party provides a fun escape and a chance to dress to impress for an evening. While being entertained, guests will also indulge in a delicious four-course meal at a local French-inspired bistro. Great acting, awesome puzzles, very fair mystery! Didn’t guess the correct answer but we did not feel like it was unfair at all. The Perfect Bite does a masterful job of telling a compelling story through puzzles, great food, and mystery — creating an experience that would make Benoit Blanc proud.

name: Cops vs Robbers
description: Dive into thrilling VR heists where you can choose to be a policeman or a robber in an intense bank robbery scenario! Test your skills and strategy as you defend yourself or outwit the opposing team in heart-pounding PvP action.

name: Adventure Mode
description: Not into head-to-head combat? Try the adventure mode , where you play as a detective hot on the trail of cunning thieves. Navigate through tricky traps and challenging puzzles to uncover the truth and save the day. The excitement never stops in this immersive, high-stakes VR experience!

name: Heist
description: Dive into Cops vs Robbers: The Heist , an intense PvE experience where you and your team of elite officers must track down a notorious bank robber in virtual reality. Strategize, coordinate, and work together to chase the thief through dynamic city environments, overcoming obstacles, traps, and AI-controlled enemies. As the robber executes their perfect getaway, your mission is to stop them before they disappear with the loot. With high-stakes chases, immersive VR action, and heart-pounding moments of suspense, Heist brings cooperative gameplay to the next level in this adrenaline-charged pursuit!

name: Team Deathmatch
description: Experience Cops vs Robbers in a thrilling team deathmatch format, where cooperation is the key to domination! In this intense PvP VR experience, players are divided into two teams—cops and robbers—each with unique abilities and objectives. Work together with your teammates to outmaneuver the opposing side, whether you’re a robber planning the perfect heist or a cop hunting down criminals. With strategic coordination, powerful weapons, and immersive environments, every battle is a high-stakes showdown. Victory is only achieved through teamwork, precision, and fast reflexes in this adrenaline-fueled virtual reality combat!

name: Free for all
description: Step into Cops vs Robbers , an exhilarating free-for-all PvP experience in virtual reality! Choose your side—cunning robbers or law-enforcing cops—and dive into chaotic, high-speed battles where every player is your enemy. As a robber, outsmart your foes with stealth and strategy, stealing loot and escaping before getting caught. As a cop, uphold justice by tracking down criminals and ensuring no one escapes.

name: Archery
description: Ditch your blasters to equip your bow and arrows ! Look around, find your target and aim to assert your dominance on the arena. This tactical game mode will put your aim and skills to the test. You better be quick if you want to become the champion of the arena.

name: King of the Hill
description: Choose your skin, form a team, and capture objectives around the map. The longer you hold an objective the more points you’ll accumulate. age_requirement: Age requirement 13+ accompanied by an adult

You and your team have one hour to enter the Ancient Temple of Ramesses and lift the curse. Armageddon is near as the doomsday clock starts ticking!

name: Escape The Village On May 2
description: You will have a whole medium level challenge wheelchair accessible A hushed whisper beckons you closer to hear their plea… “Greetings, stranger. You may notice something… odd about this place. Lately, the people of the Village at Black Creek have been possessed by something vile in nature. I fear a terrible evil has set root here. Please stranger, you are only a visitor to this place but… Will you help me unravel this dark plot?”

name: Where Dark Things Dwell
description: A very fun, creepy experience! Where Dark Things Dwell is one of the most unique escape experiences I’ve ever participated in. The puzzles are challenging but there are very helpful hints available should you need them! The whole experience leans toward creepy rather than scary but be warned, you will be expected to enter pitch black building with no idea wait awaits inside...

name: Where Dark Things Dwell (Outdoor)
description: THIS WAS A VERY COOL OUTDOOR ESCAPE ROOM EXPERIENCE! The historic setting, the actors, the dark, the puzzles - everything was so good. The level of the puzzles was perfect. ...Even though we didn’t finish, we enjoyed the process and the puzzles! I like that the non-actors checked up on us and were so nice. Lots of interactions with the masked villagers.

name: Where Dark Things Dwell
description: THIS WAS A VERY COOL OUTDOOR ESCAPE ROOM EXPERIENCE! The historic setting, the actors, the dark, the puzzles - everything was so good. The level of the puzzles was perfect. ...Even though we didn’t finish, we enjoyed the process and the puzzles! I like that the non-actors checked up on us and were so nice. Lots of interactions with the masked villagers. ...This is my favourite escape room experience and I will definitely recommend.

name: Where Dark Things Dwell

The puzzles are challenging but there are very helpful hints available should you need them! The whole experience leans toward creepy rather than scary but be warned, you will be expected to enter pitch black building with no idea wait awaits inside... Overall, a 10/10 experience, and I would highly recommend it to anyone!

name: In Rocco's Bar
description: In 1920’s Toronto, prohibition is at its peak and at the top of the bootlegging empire sits notorious gangster, Rocco Perri. But if you've got the brains the guts for it, all that could change, and someone new could take the throne.In the sordid world of swingin’ speakeasies, everyone’s out for a piece of the pie. You receive an invitation to a secret meeting at Rocco’s infamous bar. Some of these cats you play with might be your pals, and some might be mugs you ain't never met before.
location: Meet your crew at 1 Austin Terrace, Toronto, M5R 1X8. Walk towards the terrace on the East side of the building (if you're facing the main doors of Casa Loma, it will be around to your left). Just past the terrace there will be a black door marked as "AUTHORIZED PERSONS ONLY". Make sure the cops don't see you! Ring the gold and black doorbell, wait a moment, then pull the handle to open the door.

name: Casa Loma's Dragon Egg Adventure
description: Embark upon a dangerous quest to save dragons from extinction. Casa Loma’s tower becomes a portal to another world of wizards and magic, where the last dragon egg is rumoured to rest. Will you find the egg and learn the secret of the dragon’s song?

name: Dragon's Song Quest
description: You have been asked to embark upon a dangerous quest: to save dragons from extinction. Casa Loma’s tower becomes a portal to another world of wizards and magic, where the last dragon egg is rumoured to rest. Will you find the egg and learn the secret of the dragon’s song? Those who you will encounter upon this quest may be your closest confidants or may be unfamiliar faces.

name: A Secret City adventure, in partnership with… not-so-secret society
description: Meet your team at 1 Austin Terrace, Toronto, M5R 1X8. Walk towards the terrace on the East side of the building (if you're facing the main doors of Casa Loma, it will be around to your left). Beware of vines and crocodile filled moats as you approach. Just past the terrace there will be a black door marked as "AUTHORIZED PERSONS ONLY". Ring the gold and black doorbell, wait a moment, then pull the handle to open the door. We have secure storage at the game for your belongings. There are washrooms that can be accessed before and after the game. Six flights of stairs must be conquered in order to reach the mission, and then 3 spiral staircases in the game.

name: Murdoch Mysteries Escape Room
description: You must find Detective Murdoch within The experience is rated Be warned, the station house has Constables: assist us in locating Detective Murdoch! Listen up! The greatest detective in all of Canada has gone missing, and 'tis up to us to find him! As the newest constables on the force in Toronto in 1905, we must make locating William Murdoch our number one priority. We have all the resources of Station House No. 4 at our fingertips, but 'twill take more than brute strength to save Murdoch. It will take wit, intelligence, and unrelenting determination. Are ye with me? Fear not, for this experience shall not send shivers down your spine. Nor shall it, hopefully, terrify our dear Detective Murdoch wherever he may be. Live actors shall be in attendance, but they shall not lay a hand on you, and we ask the same courtesy in return. Let the sets and costumes whisk you away to Toronto in the late 1800s. Relax, and let us take you on a journey. This experience grants you exclusive access to some buildings on the Casa Loma grounds not open to the general public. Do you have the daring and courage to partake in this exclusive adventure?

name: Murdoch Mysteries themed escape room
description: This was hands down the best escape room I’ve ever played, and I’ve played some good ones. The narrative and acting really brought the experience to a whole new level, especially with how well the narrative was woven into the actual sequence of the puzzles. Satisfying and exciting from beginning to end.

Satisfying and exciting from beginning to end. Kudos to all involved.

name: A Secret City adventure, in partnership with… not-so-secret society
description: This game takes place in the historic "Coachman's Stable House" on Casa Loma grounds, found next to the stables. Please enter The Coachman's Stable House through the main entrance on Walmer Road. Your host will greet you there. We have secure storage at the game for your belongings. There are washrooms that can be accessed before, during and after the game. There are 3 steps to get to the door of the Coachman’s Stable House and a flight of stairs to access the intro/outro space, as well as the washroom.
location: The historic "Coachman's Stable House" on Casa Loma grounds, Walmer Road

name: Station M
description: Secure your place for spies on this operation Time is of the essence! This challenge includes Patriots and code crackers: an intruder has breached the tunnels... Station M was the cloak-and-dagger handle given to the covert intel hub concealed beneath the towers and ballrooms of Casa Loma. After the Big War, the facility was mothballed and left to slumber in the subterranean tunnels — until now. Against all logic, a Soviet mole posing as one of our agents has been discovered in Station M. Your mission: assist the operative in navigating the shadowy depths of Station M and find what information has been leaked. Here’s what to expect The mission ahead is nothing to fear. There are no sinister surprises awaiting you. Focus on the task at hand. There will be live agents in the field with you on this mission, but keep your distance—they won't be making any physical contact with you, and you must not do so with them. We've meticulously crafted the surroundings and attire to transport you back in time, so it feels as though you are living and breathing in the era. This mission also offers you privileged admittance to areas of the Casa Loma tunnels that would have remained inaccessible otherwise. Stay vigilant and Godspeed!

name: Station M
description: The story was great, being in the tunnels was so cool, everything felt so real and all the props provided instant feedback if you solved something. We loved the attention to detail in every room and the enthusiasm of the staff... Definitely one of the most fun things to do in Toronto. I love how immersive it was. Puzzles were all in theme. Actor was amazing. Buttercup was awesome!! So engaging and entertaining! The escape room had enough puzzles for all 9 of us to be involved the entire time and the twists were super exciting

name: Station M
description: The production value of the actors, the professional set decor is incredibly immersive, the theming really keeps you captivated and involved in your escape mission. Puzzles were difficult but a lot of fun to solve.

name: Station M
description: The war is over, the fascists in Europe have lost, and it’s time for celebration; or so it would seem.When a mysterious signal is received from the long-dormant Station M spy facility, it’s up to your team of counterspies and codebreakers to investigate the tunnels beneath the castle. Will you find the source of the signal–before it finds you, in the dark tunnels that run below Casa Loma? Can you get in and out in time? Though you may arrive with some known agents, you very well may end up working alongside unknown spies as well. It's in your best interests, however, as everyone has a spot to fill in this operation.

name: Murder Mystery Dinner
description: In collaboration with Netflix, Secret City presents a one-of-a-kind Murder Mystery Dinner experience set in the captivating and thrilling universe of the film series. This immersive event will have you on the edge of your seats as you and your team work to uncover the truth while enjoying a delicious dinner. As a member of the culinary industry elite, you’re invited to an exclusive event hosted by acclaimed Chef Maribelle Moore. Decipher the clues hidden within Maribelle’s menu. Each course contains vital information with food-based puzzles. The menu Chef Moore created will reveal a dark secret about the Salty Six, the renowned culinary supergroup formed by herself and five other chefs back when they were students.

description: There are no playing sections indoors or below decks, so we always recommend bringing an extra warm layer as the temperature tends to be cooler on the water! Do You Sail In The Rain? You will be notified in advance whenever possible.

In our most popular escape room, A Pirate's Life, you'll become part of an ancient pirate crew seeking treasure on the high seas. name: Escape Room: The Mystery of the Lost City
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure as you and your team become explorers in search of a legendary lost city. Crack codes, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets to reveal the ancient civilization's mysteries within 60 minutes.

description: You are wrongfully accused and sentenced to prison. Your only hope of escape is to work together with your team to find hidden clues, solve riddles, and break out before time runs out.

description: A mad scientist's chemical experiments have gone awry, and the lab is now filled with deadly gases. Your team must work together to solve puzzles and escape before you run out of breathable air.

name: Haunted Mansion: The Curse of the Phantom
description: A century-old curse haunts a grand mansion, and its phantom demands that intruders complete a series of challenges to lift the enchantment. Work with your team to solve riddles and escape before the ghost claims you as its own.

description: An immersive escape room experience where you and your team will solve puzzles, find clues, and crack codes to escape a themed room within 60 minutes.

description: You and your team are detectives on a mission to solve the mystery behind a priceless diamond that has been stolen. You have 60 minutes to find clues, decipher puzzles, and unravel the story before the thief returns. Can you crack the case in time?

name: Escape Room: The Zombie Apocalypse
description: The world has been taken over by zombies, and your team is locked inside a room. You have one hour to figure out how to escape before the zombies break in. Work together to solve puzzles, find keys, and unlock doors to make it out alive.

name: Escape Room: The Secret Laboratory
description: Your team is a group of scientists who have been conducting secret experiments in an underground laboratory. Something has gone wrong, and now you're trapped inside with no way out. You must solve puzzles related to chemistry, biology, and physics to escape before time runs out.
